name: data
description: A message with the reason why the receipt was generated.

name: sender
description: The sender of the transaction that generated the receipt.

name: timestamp
description: The timestamp of the block in which the receipt was generated.

name: timestampMs
description: The timestamp of the block in which the receipt was generated, in milliseconds.

name: txHash
description: The hash of the transaction that generated the receipt.

name: value
description: The amount of EGLD that was refunded/penalized from the transaction fee.
